title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid credentials and required information.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page.
Input valid user information including email and password.
Submit the registration form.
Check the system confirms successful registration and sends confirmation email if applicable.

title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Ensure users can log in with correct email and password and receive a valid JWT token.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid registered email and password.
Submit login form.
Verify the user is authenticated and receives a JWT token for session management.

title: Login Attempt with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify system denies access when user enters incorrect email or password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter an incorrect email or password.
Click the login button.
Verify that access is denied and an appropriate error message is shown.

title: Onboarding Flow Completion
description: Validate that a new user can complete the multi-step onboarding process defining vision, domains with image uploads, design selection, and approving AI decomposed goals.

steps.description: Start onboarding flow after login.
Define multi-domain life vision and input required details.
Upload domain images successfully and verify they display correctly.
Select preferred vision board design style.
Review AI-generated decomposed goals and approve or modify them.
Confirm onboarding is marked complete and user dashboard is accessible.

title: Vision Board Display Accuracy
description: Check that vision boards generate correctly in the selected design style with appropriate grayscale and colored pixel mapping per domain.

steps.description: Navigate to the dashboard vision board.
Confirm the selected design style is correctly applied.
Verify that the pixel colors accurately reflect user effort and progress status for each domain.
Ensure grayscale pixels transition correctly to color based on user progress.

title: Daily Journal Entry Submission
description: Validate that users can submit one journal entry per day linked with task completions and that the system awards pixels accordingly.

steps.description: Access the journal panel on the dashboard at bedtime reminder.
Enter daily reflections and mark completed tasks.
Submit the journal entry.
Confirm that journal entry is accepted, tasks are recorded, and pixel progress is updated appropriately.

title: Single Daily Journal Restriction
description: Verify that users cannot submit multiple journal entries for the same day.

steps.description: Submit a journal entry for the current day.
Attempt to submit a second journal entry for the same day.
Check system rejects with an informative message preventing duplicate journal entries.

title: AI Reflection Emotional and Energy Analysis
description: Verify that AI successfully analyzes journal reflections to extract emotional state and energy levels and updates pixel and task statuses accordingly.

steps.description: Submit a journal entry with rich reflections.
Check AI reflection analysis interprets emotional and energy signals from entry.
Verify corresponding updates to pixel colors and next day's tasks are generated reflecting AI insights.

title: Morning Task Presentation and Modification
description: Ensure morning tasks generated by AI are displayed properly, can be approved, adjusted, or skipped by the user.

steps.description: Receive morning reminder notification with task list.
View tasks on the dashboard.
Modify tasks by approving, adjusting details, or skipping.
Confirm task status updates reflect user actions accurately in the system.

title: Goal Mutation Without Data Loss
description: Validate that when users change goals, the system archives old goals, locks pixel progress, creates new goals, and preserves historical context with transition narratives.

steps.description: Navigate to goal management section.
Initiate goal mutation/change process.
Confirm archiving and locking of old goal progress.
Set up new goals and verify system generates transition narrative.
Ensure no data loss occurs and visual continuity is maintained on vision board.

title: Weekly Wrap Animation Generation
description: Check that weekly wraps are generated automatically with narrative summaries and smooth pixel progression animations reflecting the user activity.

steps.description: Trigger or schedule weekly wrap generation after 7 days of activities.
Validate the presence of AI-generated narrative summary matching user journals.
Verify smooth animated progression of pixels corresponding to weekly effort.

title: Reminder Notifications Delivery
description: Ensure bedtime journal and morning task validation reminders send as scheduled without duplicates, respecting user-configured times and timezones.

steps.description: Configure reminder times in user settings.
Check system sends push notification alerts at the configured times.
Confirm no duplicate notifications are sent within the same day.

title: Wallpaper Export Generation
description: Verify users can export their vision boards as wallpapers in specified mobile and desktop resolutions with valid download URLs.

steps.description: Request wallpaper export from the vision board UI.
Confirm export generates correct wallpaper file in mobile and desktop resolution formats.
Validate the download URL for the exported wallpaper is valid and accessible.

title: Video Export and Share Link Generation
description: Ensure journey video exports are generated correctly with smooth animations and that shareable links are valid and accessible.

steps.description: Initiate journey video export from timeline or weekly wrap view.
Validate video file is generated with expected animation quality matching user activity.
Verify generated shareable link is functional and provides access to the video.

title: Dashboard Responsive Layout Rendering
description: Check that dashboard components render consistently and adapt responsively across multiple device screen sizes with smooth animations.

steps.description: Access dashboard pages on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Confirm UI components layout correctly and maintain usability on all tested screen sizes.
Ensure animations are smooth and do not cause layout shifts or jank.

title: Backend API Authorization and Error Handling
description: Validate backend APIs require proper authentication, respond correctly to authorized requests, and handle errors gracefully with meaningful messages.

steps.description: Send API requests with valid JWT tokens.
Check API returns expected data with HTTP 200 status.
Send API requests with missing or invalid tokens.
Verify API rejects requests with HTTP 401 Unauthorized.
Send malformed API requests with invalid parameters.
Confirm API returns proper error codes and messages without exposing sensitive data.

title: AI Response Validation and Fallback Handling
description: Ensure AI integrations respond according to expected schemas and that fallback mechanisms activate reliably when AI services fail or return unexpected data.

steps.description: Invoke AI-driven features such as goal decomposition, reflection interpretation, and story generation.
Check AI responses comply with predefined schemas and data formats.
Simulate AI service failures or timeouts.
Verify fallback logic triggers and user receives appropriate messaging or alternative results.

title: Image Upload Security and Access Control
description: Validate domain image uploads are securely handled with proper access controls and use of signed URLs for storage and retrieval.

steps.description: Upload an image file during domain setup.
Confirm image is stored securely with appropriate metadata in S3-compatible storage.
Attempt unauthorized access to uploaded image URL.
Verify access is denied without valid signed URL or authorization.

title: Background Job Execution for Scheduled Tasks
description: Ensure background jobs execute reliably for reminders, vision board pixel progressions, pixel spillover handling, and timeline stitching tasks.

steps.description: Trigger scheduled background jobs manually or via cron simulation.
Verify each job completes successfully and updates the system state accordingly.
Confirm jobs handle failures gracefully and retry as configured.
